title: The Phil Collins Recipe
full_text:
The Phil Collins Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
Square 1
Cucumber Vodka
(see note)
3/4
ounce
fresh
lime juice
3/4
ounce
simple syrup
1/2
ounce
Yellow Chartreuse
Dash
of
cranberry bitters
Soda water
Directions
Combine vodka, lime juice, simple syrup, chartreuse, and bitters in a shaker. Fill with ice and shake vigorously for 15 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled Collins glass. Top off with soda water and serve with a long spoon.
Special Equipment
cocktail shaker, Collins glass, straw
Vodka
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
